resources.string: This screen displays a list of categories of songs classified by period, using ListView and ArrayAdapter to display the list. When clicked on any period item, a new activity is opened with a list on songs of this period. When clicking on a song, a toast message says that no mp3 file is avaiable yet

This screen displays a list of songs based on the period chosen in MainActivity This uses ListView and ArrayAdapter to display the list. When clicked on any list item, a toast message is displayed to say there is no mp3 loaded yet.
If you like rock\'n roll, play 60\'s songs.
Nostalgic of the 70\'s, back to the happy days.
